Edmonton, Alberta; Ph.D. Otto-von-Guericke Universität Magdeburg, Germany Research Interests: Interactive 3D Graphics, Non-Photorealistic Rendering, Multimedia Application Development, Biomedical Visualization Contact: Department of Computer Science Memorial University of Newfoundland St. John's, NL A1B 3X5 Canada Room: ER-6032 Phone: (709) 864-8504 Fax: (709) 864-2009 Email: oscar@mun.ca Homepage: www.cs.mun.ca/~omeruvia FacultyStaff & Administration
